about_the_game:
Another intriguing art book by Y Press Games, giving an insider perspective on the development of Alpha Hole Prison. This art book is extra large to accommodate the huge amount of art contained in the game.

    [*93 Pages]
    [*Early Sprite Art]
    [*Game Sketch Art]
    [*The Challenges of Creating a Game During the Pandemic]
    [*Advice to Other Game Creators]

And more! Y Press Games Art Books are incredibly popular because they include text on nearly every page describing what the team went through to create this game for you.

HOW TO GET YOUR DLC:
Once you purchase and install/download the Art Book in the DLC list of the game in your Steam Library, you can find the files for it in your Local Files. Right-click the name of the game from the list of games in your library (Alpha Hole Prison), click Properties, go to the Local Files tab, then click Browse Local Files. You'll find the art book in this folder.

content_descriptors.notes: Explicit sexual art on nearly every page, some violence and gore.
